channel.title: Server help
channel.description: how do i edit max hit how do i edit prices of stuff in stores how do i fix the speed of how fast you hit need a mopar compiler how do i edit spawned npc hp i did it but it wont work thats it lol

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Holy-Wings Holy-Wings
item.description:
@Holy-Wings wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkers, post:1, topic:241805”]how do i edit max hit
how do i edit prices of stuff in stores
how do i fix the speed of how fast you hit
need a mopar compiler
how do i edit spawned npc hp i did it but it wont work
thats it lol[/quote]

1 - Search hitDiff in client.JAVA.
2 - Go to the configuration folder in you source folder, then go to shops.cfg and start off their
3 - I have no idea.
4 - @echo off title Project-Penguin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
5 - Configuration folder again, npc.cfg, Search the NPC id and change it’s HP level

Hope I helped. thanks

Read full topic
